lemma max_Sup_absorb_left: fixes f g::\<open>'a \<Rightarrow> real\<close> assumes \<open>X \<noteq> {}\<close> and \<open>bdd_above (f ` X)\<close> and \<open>bdd_above (g ` X)\<close> and \<open>Sup (f ` X) \<ge> Sup (g ` X)\<close> shows \<open>Sup ((pointwise_max f g) ` X) = Sup (f ` X)\<close>
